name: MonsterAlarm
0:
”Alexa start Monster Alarm”
”Alexa open Monster alarm”
”Alexa Monster alarm”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monster alarm
Developer Terms of Use
des: Perfect against children's fears at night. Monster Alarm checks the room for monsters, chases them away with the high-frequency monster scare sound and watches out for new ones all night long. Written by parents for parents.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
